    • Uses of TauUpdate in goal.tools.mc.program.goal.prolog.trans

      Subclasses of TauUpdate in goal.tools.mc.program.goal.prolog.trans 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PrologTauUpdate
      Represents updates that are brought about by execution of a step, transition, or transition class when the Prolog KRT is used.

    • Uses of TauUpdate in goal.tools.mc.program.goal.trans

      Methods in goal.tools.mc.program.goal.trans that return TauUpdate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract TauUpdate<A> TauClass.getUpdates()
      Gets the specific updates that this step brings about, and which may be represented differently depending on the KRT in use.
      abstract TauUpdate<A> TauStep.getUpdates()
      Gets the specific updates that this step brings about, and which may be represented differently depending on the KRT in use.
      Methods in goal.tools.mc.program.goal.trans with parameters of type TauUpdate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract boolean TauUpdate.areConflicting(TauUpdate<A> updateTuple)
      Determines whether these updates are not in conflict with the specified updates.
      boolean Derives.mscderneg(MentalStateCondition msc, TauUpdate<Atom> update)
      Determines whether the specified mental state condition can become underivable from the mental state if the specified updates are brought about.
      boolean Derives.mscderpos(MentalStateCondition msc, TauUpdate<Atom> update)
      Determines whether the specified mental state condition can become derivable from the mental state if the specified updates are brought about.
